sn35.19:4.1: “Mendicants, if you enjoy the eye, you enjoy suffering.
sn35.19:4.2: If you enjoy suffering, I say you’re not exempt from suffering.
sn35.19:4.6: If you enjoy suffering, I say you’re not exempt from suffering. …”
sn35.19:4.9: If you enjoy suffering, I say you’re not exempt from suffering.
sn35.19:5.1: If you don’t enjoy sights, you don’t enjoy suffering.
sn35.19:5.2: If you don’t enjoy suffering, I say you’re exempt from suffering.
sn35.19:5.3: If you don’t enjoy the ear …
sn35.19:5.9: If you don’t enjoy suffering, I say you’re exempt from suffering.”
